sections.heading: Violation; property under contract forfeited
sections.text: Any property owned under any contract or by any combination, or pursuant to any conspiracy, and being the subject thereof, mentioned in sections 59-801 and 59-802, shall be forfeited to the state.SourceLaws 1905, c. 162, ยง 3, p. 636;R.S.1913, ยง 4047;C.S.1
